question: Khalid bin Khalifa has been recently appointed as the Prime Minister of which gulf country?
explanation:
Sheikh Khalid bin Khalifa has been named as the new Prime Minister and interior minister of the Gulf nation, Qatar. The emir or the reigning monarch of Qatar, Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani has appointed Sheikh Khalid as the new head.
The new Prime Minister took oath of office in a ceremony attended by the Emir and deputy Emir of Qatar, Abdullah bin Hamad Al Thani. After the former Prime Minister Abdullah bin Nasser bin Khalifa Al Thani submitted his resignation, the emir has named his trusted adviser, Sheikh Khalid as the successor.
